tetra.improvement.mana_repair.name: Mana repair
tetra.improvement.mana_repair.descriptio: The item will repair itself over time using mana
tetra.stats.manaRepair.tooltip: This item will use mana to repair itself over time, repairing one point of durability costs §e%s§r mana
tetra.material.feature.rootboon.tooltip:
Major modules crafted from ironwood gain an enchantment depending on the module type
 
§7As long as the enchantment doesn't conflict with any of the item's existing enchantments
tetra.material.feature.rootboon.tooltip_:
Enchantments are applied based on the following criteria:
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon AND Block breaker: §eFortune I
 §7- Block breaker: §eEfficiency I
 §7- Breakable: §eUnbreaking I
tetra.material.feature.leafboon.tooltip:
Major modules crafted from steeleaf gain an enchantment depending on the module type
 
§7As long as the enchantment doesn't conflict with any of the item's existing enchantments
tetra.material.feature.leafboon.tooltip_:
Enchantments are applied based on the following criteria:
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon AND Block breaker: §eEfficiency II
 §7- Block breaker: §eFortune II
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon: §eLooting II
tetra.material.feature.fiery_igniting.to: Major modules crafted with Fiery Ingots gain the §eIgniting§r or §eBlazing§r modifier depending on the module slot

Modules that one would hold gain the §eBlazing§7 modifier, like a handle, hilt or bow stave.
Modules that would typically hit a target gain the §eIgniting§7 modifier, like a blade or a tool head.
Using Fiery Ingots as a material for major modules with the §lBlock breaker§r aspect gain the §eAuto-smelt§r modifier
tetra.improvement.fiery_igniting.name: Igniting
tetra.improvement.fiery_igniting.descrip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire
tetra.stats.igniting.tooltip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire for §e%s§r seconds
tetra.improvement.fiery_blazing.name: Blazing
tetra.improvement.fiery_blazing.descript: Using this item has a chance to set the wielder on fire
tetra.improvement.auto_smelt.name: Auto-smelt
tetra.improvement.auto_smelt.description: Breaking blocks automatically smelts the drops
tetra.stats.autoSmelt.tooltip: Breaking blocks automatically smelts the drops
tetra/schematic/shared/fiery_bond.name: Fiery bond
tetra/schematic/shared/fiery_bond.descri: Infuse the handle with the fiery essence of a Hydra or an Ur-ghast, providing ways to counteract or leverage the blazing effect depending on the essence used.
tetra.improvement.hydral_bond.name: Hydral bond
tetra.improvement.hydral_bond.descriptio: Regains durability as the wielder takes damage
Strengthen the bond to increase it's effect.
tetra.stats.hydralBond.tooltip: Taking fire damage while holding this item has a §e%s%%§r chance to repair §e%s§r durability
tetra.improvement.quenched.name: Quenched
tetra.improvement.quenched.description: Greatly reduces the chance of triggering the Blazing effect
tetra/schematic/shared/hone_quenched.des: Strengthen the bond to increase it's effect.
tetra.material.feature.darkwrought.toolt: Blades and tool heads crafted from knightmetal gain the §eSkewering§r or §ePunishing§r modifier depending on the module
Modules considered §lEdged weapon§r AND §lBlock breaker§r gain §eSkewering§r, other modules gain §ePunishing§r. Butts are not affected.
tetra.stats.punishing.tooltip: Deals up to §e%s§r bonus damage to armored targets, depending on how many pieces of armor the target is wearing
tetra.stats.punishing.tooltip_extended: The damage is reduced based on the percentage of empty armor slots on the target, e.g. 75%% of the bonus would be applied for a target with 1 out of 4 empty armor slots. The full bonus is applied for targets with innate armor, but that are not wearing any armor.
tetra.module.double/minotaur_axe.name: Minotaur axe
tetra.module.double/minotaur_axe.descrip: A hefty axe head, often favored by minotaurs. It deals extra damage if swung while the wielder is sprinting.
tetra.stats.charging.tooltip: Attacks deal §e%s§r bonus damage while sprinting
tetra/schematic/sword/twilight_focus.des:
Craft a focus from one of the scepters found in the twilight forest.
The focus provides different on-hit or on-kill effects depending on the scepter it's made from. The foci effects often damages the item when invoked.
tetra.module.sword/twilight_focus.name: Twilight focus
tetra.module.sword/twilight_focus.descri: A focus crafted from a scepter found in the twilight forest.
tetra.variant.twilight_focus/reanimating: A focus crafted from a Zombie Scepter, living entities killed with this weapon are brought back under the will of the wielder.
A focus crafted from a Fortification Scepter, killing entities with this weapon fortifies the wielder.
tetra.variant.twilight_focus/sapping.des: A focus crafted from a Scepter of Life Draining. Attacking entities saps them, restoring health and saturation for the wielder.
tetra.variant.twilight_focus/blasting.de: A focus crafted from a Twilight Scepter, swinging this weapon in the air hurls a twilight bolt.
tetra.stats.fortifying.tooltip:
Killing an entity grants the wielder a shield that blocks the next incoming source of damage.
The shield stacks up to §e4§r times and each block removes a stack. The shield lasts for §e12§r seconds and killing an entity refreshes the duration. The item takes §e%s§r durability damage when the effect is triggered.
tetra.stats.reanimating.tooltip:
Killing an entity reanimates it under the control of the wielder, the reanimated entity begins to expire after §e%s§r seconds.
Killing undead entities (like a zombie or a skeleton) does not trigger this effect. The item takes §e%s%%§r durability damage when the effect is triggered.
tetra.stats.sapping.tooltip: Hitting an entity restores §e%s§r health and food, and §e%s§r saturation. The item takes §e%s%%§r durability damage when the effect is triggered.
tetra.stats.twilightBolt.tooltip:
Hurls a twilight bolt when swung in the air, the bolt deals §e6§r damage to the first entity it hits.
Triggering the effect causes the item to take §e%s%%§r durability damage and sets the item on a §e400%%§r (§e%s§r seconds) cooldown.
tetra.module.bow/tri_stave.name: Tri-stave
tetra.module.bow/tri_stave.description: The stave of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires three arrows at a time.
tetra.module.bow/tri_string.name: Tri-string
tetra.module.bow/tri_string.description: The string of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires three arrows at a time.
tetra.stats.verticalMultishot.tooltip:
Each shot fires §e%s§r additional projectiles, spread vertically
 
§7Spread: §e%s
tetra.module.bow/seeker_stave.name: Seeker stave
tetra.module.bow/seeker_stave.descriptio: The stave of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires seeking arrows.
tetra.module.bow/seeker_string.name: Seeker string
tetra.module.bow/seeker_string.descripti: The string of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires seeking arrows.
tetra.stats.seekerProjectiles.tooltip: Fired projectiles seek out the nearest enemy
tetra.module.bow/ice_stave.name: Ice stave
tetra.module.bow/ice_stave.description: The stave of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires freezing arrows.
tetra.module.bow/ice_string.name: Ice string
tetra.module.bow/ice_string.description: The string of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires freezing arrows.
tetra.stats.iceProjectiles.tooltip: Fired projectiles slowly freeze their target over §e10§r seconds
tetra.stats.iceProjectiles.tooltip_exten: The freezing effect acts as if the target was standing in powder snow
tetra.module.bow/ender_stave.name: Ender stave
tetra.module.bow/ender_stave.description: The stave of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires freezing arrows.
tetra.module.bow/ender_string.name: Ender string
tetra.module.bow/ender_string.descriptio: The string of a bow sometimes found in the Twilight Forest, it fires freezing arrows.
tetra.stats.enderProjectiles.tooltip: Teleports the shooter and/or target on projectile impact, and briefly renders the shooter invulnerable
tetra.stats.enderProjectilesYank.tooltip: Teleports the target to the position of the shooter on projectile impact
tetra.stats.enderProjectilesJaunt.toolti: Teleports the shooter to the position of the target on projectile impact
tetra/schematic/sword/knife.name: Knife
tetra/schematic/sword/knife.description: Craft a knife blade from the given materials. The knife can be used for crafting, cutting things on a cutting board and to harvest straw from grass.
tetra.module.sword/knife.name: Knife
tetra.module.sword/knife.description: A knife blade, it can be used for crafting, cutting things on a cutting board and to harvest straw from grass.
tetra.variant.strap1/rope.description: A rope strap that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
tetra.variant.strap2/rope.description: Two rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap3/rope.description: Three rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap4/rope.description: Four rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
